## R Markdown
```{r read in files}
library(tidyverse)
library(BoolNet)
library(Matrix)
# setwd("C:/Users/marazzi/Google Drive/ALS_IPS/zanudo2015")
network <- loadNetwork("zanudo_boolean.bn")

```

# Gerenate Random Initial States all with il15 and stimuli on, all other source nodes off
```{r}
states <- read.table("initial_states.txt", row.names = 1, header = TRUE) %>%t() %>%as.data.frame() # Dataframe without fixed values
states2 <- states # Dataframe with fixed values
states2[c("il15", "stimuli"),] <- 1

```


# Chosen with il15 and stimuli ON
```{r random initial state}

attr0<-getAttractors(network, type="synchronous",method="chosen", startStates=states2,returnTable = TRUE)
sink(file="100000_il15_stim_ON.txt",type="output")
attr0
sink(file=NULL)

```

# Chosen with il15 and stimuli ON, other source nodes OFF
```{r}
states2[c("stimuli2", "cd45", "tax", "pdgf"),] <- 0
attr1<-getAttractors(network, type="synchronous",method="chosen", startStates=states2,returnTable = TRUE)
sink(file="100000_il15_stim_ON_s2_cd45_tax_pdgf_OFF.txt",type="output")
attr1
sink(file=NULL)
```


```{r}
attr3<-getAttractors(network, type="synchronous",method="chosen", startStates=states,returnTable = TRUE)
sink(file="100000.txt",type="output")
attr3
sink(file=NULL)
```
